head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths EKLUND, GEORGE J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths EKLUND, GEORGE J.

block.p: EKLUND-George J. Age 57, of Mendham on Sunday, October 15. Husband of Audrey (nee Tallo) Eklund. Father of Drew and Gray Eklund. Brother of Ann Sawicki, Barbara Auris and Evelyn Motte. A Mass of the Resurrection will be offered on Thursday, October 19 at 10 A.M., at St. Mary's Abbey, Delbarton School, Morristown, N.J. Visitation Wednesday 2 to 4 and 7-9PM at the Bailey Funeral Home, Inc., 8 Hilltop Road, Mendham, N.J. Memorial gifts may be made to Delbarton School, Mendham Road, Morristown, N.J. 07960 or the Brain Tumor Society, 124 Watertown Street, Suite 3H, Watertown, MA. 02472-2500.
